issue.title: [C++] Benchmarks fail to build ARROW_IPC=OFF and ARROW_BUILD_TESTS=OFF
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9209](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9209). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm fixing this in a patch I'm working on but wanted to note it for the changelog's sake

https://gist.github.com/wesm/0863df29310ba3e883af426fd6121c30

ARROW_IPC=OFF was being set by `archery benchmark` but when ARROW_BUILD_TESTS=ON it was being re-enabled in cpp/CMakeLists.txt
